templates.title: I Hate Money
templates.name: ihatemoney
templates.description: I hate money is a web application made to ease shared budget management. It keeps track of who bought what, when, and for whom; and helps to settle the bills.
templates.note: A simple shared budget manager web application

env.name: null
env.label: null
env.description: Sets the secret key environment variable for the application.

env.name: null
env.label: null
env.description: Sets the admin password. On the host run: docker run -it --rm --entrypoint ihatemoney ihatemoney/ihatemoney generate_password_hash

env.label: null
env.description: Disables secure session cookies for development.
